job.title: Software Engineer
job.description: To help Trust scale our products and our team, we need an engineer that wants to step into a central role in our company. We are looking for an engineer whose work will focus on our core API but will involve projects up and down our stack. Responsibilities Work with product owners to define functional and non-functional requirements Design software architecture and systems to meet specified requirements Work closely with technical and non-technical team members Produce documentation for software and systems Maintain and improve the software as needed Assist in building a team of software developers (assist with hiring, mentorship, etc.) Required Qualifications 3+ years of software development experience. Expertise with object-oriented programming languages. Particularly Python. Expertise with relational databases. Particularly PostgreSQL Experience with API frameworks (e.g. Flask, FastAPI, Ruby on Rails). Proven ability to design, build, and document APIs Strong technical communication skills Results-focused, collaborative, and pragmatic Nice-to-have Qualifications FinTech / Finance experience Familiarity / Expertise with FastAPI framework Familiarity with Ops platforms tools and processes (AWS, GCS, etc.) Data pipeline experience Familiarity with Docker
